scripts.test: export ENV_TYPE=TEST && export NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-worker && yarn app:build && truffle migrate --reset --network development && yarn app:build && mocha test --timeout 600000 --exit
scripts.app:build: flow-remove-types app/ -d _build/ && mkdir -p _build/contracts && mkdir -p _build/circuits && cp app/contracts/* _build/contracts/ | true && cp app/circuits/* _build/circuits/ | true
scripts.circuit:updatestatetree:setup: cd app/circuits && snarkjs setup --protocol groth -c update_state_tree.json --pk update_state_tree_proving_key.json --vk update_tree_state_verifying_key.json
scripts.circuit:updatestatetree:generateverifier: mkdir -p contracts && cd app/circuits && snarkjs generateverifier --protocol groth --vk update_tree_state_verifying_key.json -v UpdateStateTreeVerifier.sol && mv UpdateStateTreeVerifier.sol ../../contracts/UpdateStateTreeVerifier.sol && cd ../../contracts && sed -i.bak -e "s/Verifier/UpdateStateTreeVerifier/g" -- UpdateStateTreeVerifier.sol && rm -- UpdateStateTreeVerifier.sol.bak
